get.description: Basic health check that returns application status and metadata
Readiness check that verifies the application can access critical dependencies

200.description: Application is ready to serve requests

503.description: Application is not ready to serve requests

get.description: Simple liveness check to verify the application is running
Retrieve detailed information for a specific Delta Sharing share by name.

delete.description: Permanently delete a Delta Sharing share and all its associated permissions.

example.detail: Permission denied to delete share as user is not the owner

post.description: Create a new Delta Sharing share for Databricks-to-Databricks data sharing.

get.summary: List Shares All Or With Prefix
get.description: List all Delta Sharing shares with optional prefix filtering and pagination.

204.description: No shares found for search criteria

example.detail: No shares found for search criteria.

put.description: Add data objects (tables, views, schemas) to an existing Delta Sharing share.

400.description: Data object already exists in share

example.Message: Data object already exists in share

put.description: Remove data objects (tables, views, schemas) from a Delta Sharing share.
Grant SELECT permission to a recipient for a Delta Sharing share.

409.description: Recipient already has access to share

put.description: Revoke SELECT permission from a recipient for a Delta Sharing share.

409.description: Recipient already has access to share

get.description: Get a specific recipient by name.

get.description: List all recipients or with optional prefix filtering.
